header.description: No header scalars — this report contains no title-area parameter fields outside the data table.

rows.description: Each row from neuract__LT_TABLE represents one timestamp snapshot with readings from all available Level Transmitter sensors. The first column displays the formatted timestamp (LEVEL TRANSMITTER label); subsequent columns display numeric LT sensor readings. Three sensors (LT-122, LT-124, LT-133) are absent from the schema and will render empty.

totals.description: No totals row required for this report.

semantics: All tokens are direct column pass-throughs from neuract__LT_TABLE. The timestamp column (row_level_transmitter) is formatted for display using format_date. Optional date_from/date_to parameters filter the queried time window before iteration. Unresolved tokens (row_lt_122, row_lt_124, row_lt_133) render as empty cells since the instruments are not present in the database schema.
transformations: No reshape — neuract__LT_TABLE is natively wide; each database row is one timestamp with all sensor readings as columns.
Timestamp column (timestamp_utc) formatted to dd-mm-yyyy HH:MM:SS string via row_computed.format_date for display in the LEVEL TRANSMITTER column.
All 26 resolved numeric LT sensor columns formatted to 2 decimal places via formatters.
Optional date range filter applied to timestamp_utc before row iteration.
